item.title: Making Pull Requests
item.description: Excited much? Yes I am. I have wanted to contribute to an open source project for a really, really long time. I am unreasonably psyched about the whole experience right now. Trigger warning: I am going to be unironically enthusiastic. Sorry. Here is how I did the do It was unbelievably easy. I noticed in the github news stream that one of my friends had starred a project, and it looked kind of cool.
